constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 23 (Monday, February 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. MOORE of Wisconsin:
H.R. 945.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article 1, Section 8, Clause 2 of the United
States Constitution
[Page H484]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

title: To direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to issue guidance to States to educate providers, managed care entities, and other insurers about the value and process of delivering respectful maternal health care through diverse and multidisciplinary care provider models, and for other purposes.
